title: 就在今天，时代变了！龙之队NB
author: CHHBlock
txt_content:
泰坦陨落！
恭喜上海龙之队以4:1战胜温哥华泰坦队
发10块锭庆幸！上海龙NB！！！！！
10块锭可以说是我全部家当了

replies.author: X7-Network
replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜，感谢楼主的锭锭

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: 原来是守望先锋。。

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content: 谢锭 XD  粉红粉红的 来瞅瞅

replies.author: wadda7
replies.txt_content: 时代变了

replies.author: 烈凝_同志
replies.txt_content: 祝贺，恭喜啊

replies.author: Citysands
replies.txt_content:
恭喜
感谢发锭
（啧还没有抢完233

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content: 在一个买塞克论坛上恭喜竞技游戏可海星
感谢感谢，时代变了

replies.author: zhong_li
replies.txt_content: 谢谢大佬 的金

replies.author: Dr.Slime
replies.txt_content: 嚯嚯，龙之队NB

replies.author: 毅毅最酷
replies.txt_content: 哇塞  恭喜恭喜 谢谢金

replies.txt_content: woc龙之队赢了？？他不是原来的他了

replies.author: 离落
replies.txt_content: 啧，来迟了，恭喜=-=

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 好久没玩ow了，话说这一届的实力还行

replies.author: 文豪小绝
replies.txt_content: 上海龙队当真黑马王。。

replies.author: 咸鱼坊
replies.txt_content: hhhhhhh就在今天！他夺冠了！

replies.author: RF_huixue
replies.txt_content:
我记得龙之队好像还有个记录
算了不提了，ow对吧，恭喜龙之队

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content: 恭喜恭喜 龙之队冲冲冲！
